author: andschwa
body: We have some Jenkins job that run our tests over PSRP to Linux, but don't currently get reports.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Had Slack integration... it's just that the job was not setup to detect failures. So while it was broken for the last 100 builds, it reported as "passed." I've fixed this, and changed the notifications to both "success" and "failure" so all jobs are reported at most and at least once.

title: Add PSCore #ci Slack integration for Jenkins jobs
